turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I'd like to order a coffee drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, what location will you be picking up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The address is 7112 W North Ave in Chicago.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What coffee drink would you like today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a Cappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Size Medium, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have a milk preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, soy milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like anything added to the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Some hazelnut would be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any sugar or whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What time would you like to pick up your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: In about 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good, anything else you would like to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, one moment while I place the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your Starbucks order for 7112 W North Ave is now confirmed. Estimated pick up time is 10-15 minutes. You can find your receipt shortly via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks! Goodbye.
